creator: larouanne@idm.fr
text:
When I go on my server with the numeric IP (http://1050681479/ at place of http://62.160.32.135/) Apache return a 400 Error (Your browser sent a request that this server could not understand.
Client sent malformed Host header) I don't know if this is a bug but this request work with apache 1.3.*

This bug has already been reported, fixed, and will be included in the next
release of Apache.

Thanks for using Apache!

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7441 ***
creator: jerenkrantz@apache.org
